help-file.title: "AIR MAGUS"
help-file.content:
The Air Magus has mastered the elements of the air itself. They can transform their very bodies into particles of air, making them difficult to knock down. They may also transform an entire room into that similar to the Air Plane, causing all in the room both the benefits and drawbacks of battling on that terrain.
Innate Abilities --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 30th level: Fly
Spells --------------------------------------------------------------------------- 10th circle: Air Form 11th circle: Ethereal Grounds
